name: Shin Megami Tensei Vertex
summary:
This is a fangame based on Atlus's franchise, Shin Megami Tensei. All of this made on RPG Maker MV.

This game has the purpose to be a base for coming projects that will use this copy of the gameplay used in SMT games, including the weakness system, the negotiation and some weird fusion system.

In this game you're a human who is trapped in the Vertex World, where dangerous demons wander in the many Steps.

To fight them you've to become stronger and make those demons your allies and fight alongside them.
